thread.title: 11 tips for new dads from guys who have been there
thread.title_full: 11 tips for new dads from guys who have been there

author: Carolyn Robertson
title: 11 tips for new dads from guys who have been there
text:
by Carolyn Robertson posted in Mom Stories We hear a lot of great, practical advice and tips for expectant moms - but what about all those dads-to-be out there? While the shelves are full of baby books geared towards women, the guys are often an afterthought, left to figure things out as they go. This... Read more Â»

Want to get the full story? Click on the headline above. And thanks for reading the BabyCenter Blog.
